Impulsive! is a collection of reworked songs from the esteemed catalog of Impulse! Records. Mining a generation of experimental, visionary DJs/producers, Impulsive! re-imagines legendary jazz tracks from composers like Charles Mingus, Dizzy Gillespie, Pharoah Sanders, Yusef Lateef and more. The music of Impulse! was a crucial component to the development of jazz music in the '60s and '70s, allowing its artists a home to work out their most creative ideas, and that spirit continues today with Impulsive!.


1. Helluva Town, A - George Russell (Sa-Ra Go remix)
2. II B.S. - Charles Mingus (RZA's Mingus Bounce mix)
3. El Toro - Chico Hamilton (Mark De Clive-Lowe remix)
4. Mizrab - Gabor Szabo (Prefuse 73 remix)
5. Swing Low, Sweet Cadillac - Dizzy Gillespie (Gerardo Frisina remix)
6. Spanish Rice - Clark Terry/Chico O'Farrill (DJ Dolores remix)
7. Attica Blues - Archie Shepp (The Chief Xcel remix)
8. Astral Traveling - Pharoah Sanders (Boozoo Bajou remix)
9. Bamboo Flute Blues - Yusef Lateef (Kid Koala remix)
10. Stolen Moments - Oliver Nelson (Teflon Tel-Aviv remix)
11. At Night - John Coltrane/Ravi Coltrane/Julie Patton (Poem)
